DOC.brief_title: Post-Operative Nausea And Vomiting Study In Female Patients
DOC.detailed_description: A Multicenter , Randomized , Double-blind , Placebo-controlled , Parallel Group , Phase II Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy Oral Dosing GW679769 ( 50 mg 150 mg ) Three Consecutive Days When Administered Single Intravenous Dose Ondansetron Hydrochloride Prevention Post-operative Nausea Vomiting Post-discharge Nausea Vomiting Female Subjects Known Risk Factors Post-operative Nausea Vomiting Who Undergoing Laparoscopic/Laparotomic Surgical Procedures Associated Increased Emetogenic Risk
